response: it is important for individuals to have control over their personal information and how it is used by companies. data privacy laws are being put in place to protect individual's rights, including the ability to access, delete, or restrict the use of their data. the general data protection regulation (gdpr) was implemented in europe in may 2018, which gives individuals more control over their personal data and holds companies accountable for protecting it. it is important for people to be aware of these laws and take steps to protect themselves online.<|endoftext|>
